reverie.title: ë ˆë²„ë¦¬ - ë°œë¼íŠ¸ë¡œ ëª¨ë“œë¥¼ ë§Œë“­ë‹ˆë‹¤
reverie.description: íŠ¹ë³„í•œ ìƒì ê³¼ ê´€ë ¨ëœ ì»¨í…ì¸ ë¥¼ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” ì˜í™” í…Œë§ˆì˜ í™•ì¥ ëª¨ë“œì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
reverie.name: ë ˆë²„ë¦¬
reverie.intro-1: Ever had a dream where all shop cards become Negative? Or a dream that shop becomes complete gacha and RNG? They are all here, just prepare your tickets!
reverie.intro-2: Reverie is a movie-themed Balatro expansion that focuses on providing special shops and various contents around it.
reverie.install-1: Install Steamodded (0.9.8 or higher) and Lovely (v0.5.0-beta2 or higher).
reverie.install-2: Download the mod and unzip it.
reverie.install-3: Put <xin><c>Reverie</></> folder into <xin><c>C:\Users\(USER)\AppData\Roaming\Balatro\Mods</></>. Create the <xin><c>Mods</></> folder if it doesn't exist.

languages.description: Following languages are supported for now.

reverie.contents: Current version has <cine>{cines} Cines</>, <sp>{spectrals} Spectral</>, <at>{jokers} Joker</>, <at>{vouchers} Vouchers</>, <at>{backs} Decks</>, <at>{boosters} Booster Packs</>, and <at>{tags} Tags</>.

changelog.1-0-1: ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where completing Exchange Coupon may crashed the game|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Cine slot doesn't get affected by screenshake|ğŸ”§ Fixed some minor wording
changelog.1-0-2: ğŸ”§ Added compatibility with DX Boosters|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Filmstrip Deck doesn't give additional Cine slot|ğŸ”§ Fixed imcompatibility with other modded Jokers
changelog.1-1-0: âœ¨ Added a new Spectral card: Reverie|âœ¨ Added new Booster Packs: Jumbo Film Pack, Mega Film Pack|ğŸ”¼ Changed requirements for Poker Face Exchange Coupon: enhancing 10 cards â†’ 8 cards|ğŸ”„ Changed requirements for Eerie Inn Exchange Coupon: now requires destroying 5 cards|ğŸ”„ Changed Eerie Inn: now only Spectral Packs appear and increases reroll cost by X2|ğŸ”½ Changed requirements for Tag or Die Exchange Coupon: skipping 3 Blinds â†’ 4 Blinds|ğŸ”½ Changed Tag or Die: Tags cost $7 â†’ $8|ğŸ”¼ Now using Cine cards will restock all Booster Packs|ğŸ”§ Added compatibility with Gacha Deck from Gimmicky Decks Pack|ğŸ”§ Added background particles to Pack and Film Packs|ğŸ”§ Improved Negative visuals on Cine cards|ğŸ”§ Improved compatibility with DX Tarots|ğŸ”§ Improved descriptions to be more clear|ğŸ”§ Fixed interation between purchased Tags and Double Tag|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where viewing deck or opening collection progressed Poker Face Exchange Coupon|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Crazy Lucky didn't properly stack with Let It Moon/Eerie Inn/Tag or Die|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where opening modded Booster Packs didn't progress Crazy Lucky Exchange Coupon|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where progress of Tag or Die Exchange Coupon didn't get saved|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where selling Editioned consumables progressed Gem Heist Exchange Coupon|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where rewards of Exchange Coupons can show up debuffed|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where after using I Sing, I've No Shape could crash the game in rare cases
changelog.1-2-0: âœ¨ Added new cross-mod Cine cards: Fool Metal Alchemist, Every Hue, Radioactive|âœ¨ Added new Vouchers: Script, Megaphone|ğŸ”½ Changed Crazy Lucky: increased chances of getting Jokers/Playing cards, decreased chances of Tags/Vouchers, significantly decreased chances of complete Cine cards|ğŸ”½ Changed requirements for I Sing, I've No Shape Exchange Coupon: score more than X2 Chips in 2 Blinds â†’ 3 Blinds|ğŸ”½ Changed I Sing, I've No Shape: reroll cost modifier X3 â†’ +$20, now no longer rerolls Booster Packs|ğŸ”½ Changed Let It Moon: removed X0.5 reroll cost modifier|ğŸ”½ Now reroll cost modifiers of Cine cards can stack|ğŸ”§ Added cross-mod compatibilities to Morsel: MoreFluff, Pampa Joker Pack, Ortalab|ğŸ”§ Added tooltips to Jokers that purchased during Morsel|ğŸ”§ Significantly refactored codes to remove potential incompatibilities|ğŸ”§ Improved interaction between Morsel and I Sing, I've No Shape|ğŸ”§ Improved Booster Pack sprites|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where selling or using consumables progressed Eerie Inn Exchange Coupon|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Playing Cards from Pack didn't become Polychrome when Gem Heist and Crazy Lucky were stacked|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where you couldn't select Ankh from Pack when Joker slot was full|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where using Crazy Lucky could crash the game in rare cases|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where you couldn't use consumables when Pack is opened
changelog.1-2-1: ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Eerie Inn Exchange Coupon progressed when cards from DX Tarots are used|ğŸ”§ Fixed a bug where Eerie Inn Exchange Coupon progressed when selling a card

reverie.cines-1: <cine>Cine</> cards are new type of consumables that can temporarily spice up your shop. To get them, you first need to earn <cine>Exchange Coupons</> from Booster Packs or Tags.
reverie.cines-2: They are some sort of quests that will turn into Cine card once you complete the requirements. In rare cases, you can get Cine card directly without going through quests.
reverie.cines-3: Cine cards have their own dedicated card area, <cine>Cine slot</>, separate from consumable slot.
reverie.cines-4: Using two or more Cine cards in one shop will replace each other, unless you are playing with <cine>Filmstrip Deck</>. Combining Cine cards is very satisfying and powerful, so try out many different combos!

gem-heist.name: Gem Heist
gem-heist.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Gem Heist after selling 2 Editioned Jokers
(Currently 0/2)

Gem Heist
During this shop, all cards become Polychrome and 25% off
Rerolls cards

tag-or-die.name: Tag or Die
tag-or-die.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Tag or Die after skipping 4 Blinds
(Currently 0/4)

Tag or Die
During this shop, only Tags that cost $8 appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

eerie-inn.name: Eerie Inn
eerie-inn.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Eerie Inn after destroying 5 cards
(Currently 0/5)

Eerie Inn
During this shop, only Spectral Packs appear
X2 reroll cost
Rerolls Booster Packs

let-it-moon.name: Let It Moon
let-it-moon.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Let It Moon after using 10 Planet or Tarot cards
(Currently 0/10)

Let It Moon
During this shop, only Planet and Tarot cards appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

poker-face.name: Poker Face
poker-face.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Poker Face after enhancing 8 Playing cards
(Currently 0/8)

Poker Face
During this shop, only Playing cards from your deck appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

crazy-lucky.name: Crazy Lucky
crazy-lucky.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Crazy Lucky after opening 6 Booster Packs
(Currently 0/6)

Crazy Lucky
During this shop, everything becomes Pack
Rerolls Booster Packs

adrifting.name: Adrifting
adrifting.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Adrifting after playing 5 debuffed or faced down cards
(Currently 0/5)

Adrifting
During this shop, everything is faced down and costs $1
Rerolls cards and Booster Packs

morsel.name: Morsel
morsel.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Morsel after getting 2 Food Jokers
(Currently 0/2)

Morsel
During this shop, only Food Jokers with doubled ability values appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

unseen.name: The Unseen
unseen.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to The Unseen after having 1 empty Joker slot for 5 rounds
(Currently 0/5)

The Unseen
During this shop, all Jokers and consumables become Negative
X5 reroll cost
Rerolls cards

ive-no-shape.name: I Sing, I've No Shape
ive-no-shape.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to I Sing, I've No Shape after scoring more than X2 of required Chips in 3 Blinds
(Currently 0/3)

I Sing, I've No Shape
During this shop, only owned Jokers appear
+$20 reroll cost

alchemist.name: Fool Metal Alchemist
alchemist.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Fool Metal Alchemist after using 5 Alchemical cards
(Currently 0/5)

Fool Metal Alchemist
During this shop, +2 consumable slot and only Alchemical cards appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

every-hue.name: Every Hue
every-hue.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Every Hue after using 2 Colour cards
(Currently 0/2)

Every Hue
During this shop, only Colour cards that already have 3 rounds appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

radioactive.name: Radioactive
radioactive.description:
Exchange Coupon
Converts to Radioactive after getting 1 Fusion Joker
(Currently 0/1)

Radioactive
During this shop, only Jokers that can be used in Fusions appear
Rerolls Booster Packs

reverie.name: Reverie
reverie.description: Applies every <cine>Cine cards</> to this shop

tag-pack-normal.name: Tag Pack
tag-pack-normal.description:
Choose 1 of up to 2 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

tag-pack-jumbo.name: Jumbo Tag Pack
tag-pack-jumbo.description:
Choose 1 of up to 4 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

tag-pack-mega.name: Mega Tag Pack
tag-pack-mega.description:
Choose 2 of up to 4 Tags
(Only appears with Tag or Die)

film-pack-normal.name: Film Pack
film-pack-normal.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>2</> <cine>Exchange Coupons</> to add to your possesion

film-pack-jumbo.name: Jumbo Film Pack
film-pack-jumbo.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>4</> <cine>Exchange Coupons</> to add to your possesion

film-pack-mega.name: Mega Film Pack
film-pack-mega.description: Choose <at>1</> of up to <at>2</> <cine>Cine</> cards to add to your possesion

pack-normal.name: Pack
pack-normal.description:
Choose 1 of up to 4 anything to add to your possesion
(Only appears with Crazy Lucky)

stamp-tag.name: Stamp Tag
stamp-tag.description:
Gives a free Jumbo Tag Pack
(Only appears with Stamp Deck)

dynamic-film.name: Dynamic Film
dynamic-film.description:
This Joker gains +15 Chips every time an Exchange Coupon progresses
(Currently +0 Chips)

script.name: Script
script.description: <at>+1</> card slot available in shop while <cine>Cine</> card is active
